actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the President and President pro tempore of the Senate to make certain appointments after the sine die adjournment of the present session.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the Senate and President pro tempore of the Senate to make certain commission and committee appointments after the sine die adjournment of the present session.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the President and President pro tempore of the Senate to make certain appointments after the sine die adjournment of the present session.
